onChange.script:
#Get a copy of the row data
	self.custom.editData = self.params.rowData
	#Verify the email is valid
	email = self.custom.editData.email
	#system.perspective.print(email)
	self.custom.emailValid = pattern.verifyEmail(email)

config.script:
#Send the message to refresh the table
	messageType = 'refreshStaffSettings'
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="Clear_StaffPanel", payload={}, scope="session")

import traceback
	try:
		project = "HMS"
		### Declare parameters 
		staffId = self.view.custom.staffId
		humanId = self.view.custom.editData.humanId
		active = self.view.custom.editData.active
		isFacilitator = self.view.custom.editData.isFacilitator
		firstName = self.view.custom.editData.firstName
		middleName = self.view.custom.editData.middleName
		lastName = self.view.custom.editData.lastName
		suffix = self.view.custom.editData.suffix
		dob = self.view.custom.editData.dob
		genderId = self.view.custom.editData.genderId
		phone = self.view.custom.editData.phone
		system.perspective.print(phone) 
		altPhone = self.view.custom.editData.altPhone
		email = self.view.custom.editData.email
		##strip email address to avoid addition of any space or new line outside email address
		email = email.strip()
		jobTitle = self.view.custom.editData.jobTitle
		assignment = self.view.custom.editData.assignment
		## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
		if None in [staffId,active,isFacilitator,firstName,lastName,genderId]:
			valid = False
			#system.perspective.print('Null Error')
			error_message = "Please fill in all the mandatory fields correctly before saving (Null Error)"
		elif firstName.strip() == "":
			valid = False
			#system.perspective.print('First Name Error')
			error_message = "Please fill in the First Name before saving."
		elif lastName.strip() == "":
			valid = False
			#system.perspective.print('Last Name Error')
			error_message = "Please fill in the Last Name before saving."
		elif genderId < 0:
			valid = False
			#system.perspective.print('Gender Error')
			error_message = "Please select a Gender before saving."
		else:
			valid = True
			system.perspective.print("Staff Settings Data Valid")
		
		### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
		if valid:
			## Convert Phone numbers to numeric value only
			phone = normalize.phone(phone)
			altPhone = normalize.phone(altPhone)
			#DOB validation	
			try:
				dob = system.date.parse(dob)
				#system.perspective.print('DOB sucessfully parsed: ' + str(dob))
			except:
				dob = '1900-01-01 00:00:00'
				#system.perspective.print('DOB set to default: ' + str(dob))
			##### Check if the user is editing existing data
			if staffId == -1:
				### Create transaction
				transactionFailed = False
				txId1 = system.db.beginTransaction(timeout=10000)
				try:
					#Insert the Human Data
					path = "Settings/Staff/Insert New Human"
					parameters = {
								"firstName":firstName,
								"middleName":middleName,
								"lastName":lastName,
								"suffix":suffix,
								"dob":dob,
								"genderId":genderId,
								"phone":phone,
								"altPhone":altPhone,
								"email":email
								}
					humanId = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId1, getKey=True)
					#Insert the Staff Data
					path = "Settings/Staff/InsertNewStaff"
					parameters = {
								"humanId":humanId,
								"isFacilitator":isFacilitator,
								"jobTitle":jobTitle,
								"assignment":assignment
								}
					staffId = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId1, getKey=True)
				except:
					transactionFailed = True
					logger = system.util.getLogger("Settings Staff Button Save")
					msg = traceback.format_exc()
					logger.error(msg)
				### Check if an error occured rollback the transaction
				if transactionFailed:
					system.db.rollbackTransaction(txId1)
					self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")
					Refresh = 0
				### Otherwise commit and refresh
				else:
					system.db.commitTransaction(txId1)
					#Send to Breeze
					if isFacilitator:
						Integrations.breeze.helper.addHumanToBreeze(humanId, tags = ['Staff','Facilitator'])
					else:
						Integrations.breeze.helper.addHumanToBreeze(humanId, tags = ['Staff'])
					#Show the success message
					self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("New Staff Created Successfully")
					#Refresh the table
					system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshStaffSettings", payload={}, scope="session")
					system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshStaffSettingsQuery", payload={}, scope="session")
					system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="Clear_StaffPanel", payload={}, scope="session")
				### Always close the transaction	
				system.db.closeTransaction(txId1)
			elif staffId >= 0:
				#If not active or email has changed remove the user credentials first
				oldEmail = self.view.params.rowData.email
				
				if not active or oldEmail != email:
					try:
						# check if email not used by another active staff
						result = system.db.runPrepQuery("SELECT e.ID as 'staffId' FROM staff.Employee e INNER JOIN  humans.Human h on e.humanId = h.id WHERE e.timeRetired is null AND h.email = '"+str(oldEmail)+"' AND e.ID != "+str(staffId))
						if result.getRowCount()<1:				
							removeUser = system.user.removeUser('default',oldEmail)
					except:
						pass
					try:
						# check if email not used by another active staff
						result = system.db.runPrepQuery("SELECT e.ID as 'staffId' FROM staff.Employee e INNER JOIN  humans.Human h on e.humanId = h.id WHERE e.timeRetired is null AND h.email = '"+str(email)+"' AND e.ID != "+str(staffId))
						if result.getRowCount()<1:
							removeUser = system.user.removeUser('default',email)
					except:
						pass
				### Create transaction
				transactionFailed = False
				txId1 = system.db.beginTransaction(timeout=10000)
				try:
					if active:
						timeRetired = None
					else:
						timeRetired = system.date.now()
					#Update the Human Data
					path = "Settings/Staff/UpdateStaffHuman"
					parameters = {
								"humanId":humanId,
								"firstName":firstName,
								"middleName":middleName,
								"lastName":lastName,
								"suffix":suffix,
								"dob":dob,
								"genderId":genderId,
								"phone":phone,
								"altPhone":altPhone,
								"email":email,
								"timeRetired":timeRetired
								}
					success = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId1, getKey=True)
					#Update the Staff Data

					path = "Settings/Staff/UpdateStaff"
					parameters = {
								"staffId":staffId,
								"isFacilitator":isFacilitator,
								"jobTitle":jobTitle,
								"timeRetired":timeRetired,
								"assignment":assignment
								}
					staffId = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, tx=txId1, getKey=True)
				except:
					transactionFailed = True
					logger = system.util.getLogger("Settings Staff Button Save")
					msg = traceback.format_exc()
					logger.error(msg)
				### Check if an error occured rollback the transaction
				if transactionFailed:
					system.db.rollbackTransaction(txId1)
					self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")
					Refresh = 0
				### Otherwise commit and refresh
				else:
					system.db.commitTransaction(txId1)#Update existing data on specified row_id
					#Send to Breeze if necessary
					updateBreeze = False
					activeSQL = self.view.params.rowData.active
					isFacilitatorSQL = self.view.params.rowData.isFacilitator
					firstNameSQL = self.view.params.rowData.firstName
					lastNameSQL = self.view.params.rowData.lastName
					phoneSQL = self.view.params.rowData.phone
					emailSQL = self.view.params.rowData.email
					if (
						firstNameSQL != firstName
						or lastNameSQL != lastName
						or phoneSQL != phone
						or emailSQL != email
						or activeSQL != active
						or isFacilitatorSQL != isFacilitator
						or active == False
						):
						updateBreeze = True
					if updateBreeze:
						system.perspective.print('Breeze Update Required')
						Integrations.breeze.helper.removeBreezePerson(humanID=humanId)
						if active:
							if isFacilitator:
								Integrations.breeze.helper.addHumanToBreeze(humanId, tags = ['Staff','Facilitator'])
							else:
								Integrations.breeze.helper.addHumanToBreeze(humanId, tags = ['Staff'])
					#Show the success message
					self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Staff Updated Successfully")
					#Refresh the table
					system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshStaffSettings", payload={}, scope="session")
					system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshStaffSettingsQuery", payload={}, scope="session")
					system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="Clear_StaffPanel", payload={}, scope="session")
				### Always close the transaction	
				system.db.closeTransaction(txId1)
		else:
			#Show the error message
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage(error_message)
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Staff Settings button_save")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

#Individual user names are the email address
	email = self.view.custom.editData.email
	firstName = self.view.custom.editData.firstName
	lastName = self.view.custom.editData.lastName
	staffId = self.view.custom.staffId
	#if the email is not valid then stop here
	if not self.view.custom.emailValid:
		return
	#Determine if this is a new user or existing user
	users = system.user.getUsers('default')
	newUser = True
	userRoles = None
	for user in users:
		testUsername = user.get('username')
		if testUsername == email:
			#If existing user then get existing roles
			newUser = False
			break
	
	parameters = {
				'messageName':None,
				'dockName':'UserCredentials',
				'firstName':firstName,
				'lastName':lastName,
				'email':email,
				'staffId':staffId,
				'newUser':newUser
				}
	system.perspective.openDock('UserCredentials',params = parameters)

props.text: Please fill in all the fields correctly before saving.

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(3)
	self.meta.visible = False

messageHandlers.script:
self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.lastName = ''
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.dob = ''
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.genderId = -1
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.staffId = -1
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.suffix = ''
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.breezeId = -1
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.firstName = ''
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.humanId = -1
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.middleName = ''
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.active = 1
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.nickname = ''
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row1").props.params.isFacilitator = 0
	
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row2").props.params.email = ''
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row2").props.params.phone = ''
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row2").props.params.staffId = -1
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row2").props.params.breezeId = -1
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row2").props.params.humanId = -1
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row2").props.params.altPhone = ''
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row2").props.params.jobTitle = ''
	
	self.getChild("EmbeddedView Row3").props.params.email = ''
